create-password.introduction: To create a Digital ID you need to complete the following steps.
create-password.unequal-passwords: The passwords you provided are not the same. Please try again.
create-password.conclusion: Great! You have created a password.

enroll-in-program.introduction: We have received your request to apply for {{programTitle}} of {{ngo}}.
enroll-in-program.introduction-questions: To make sure you get the best possible help and a fair process, we need some personal information.
enroll-in-program.dob-feedback: Your date of birth does not have a valid format. Please adjust and save again.
enroll-in-program.please-confirm: Below is an overview of your information. Please confirm and submit.
enroll-in-program.confirm-received: Next step: Make an appointment for Digital ID activation and program application.
enroll-in-program.prepare-documents: To save time at your appointment, make sure to bring these documents:

initial-needs.introduction: In order to help you as best as possible, please tell us what your needs are.
initial-needs.conclusion: Thank you for sharing. Understanding your needs will help us create better programs in your area.

choose-credential-type.conclusion-program: To apply to a program you need to have a valid Digital ID.

select-appointment.thanks-repeat: You have selected the following date and time:
select-appointment.documents: Please ensure you have the following documents:
select-appointment.conclusion: Thank you. Your appointment for Digital ID activation and program application is confirmed.
select-appointment.qr-code: Please show this QR-code at your meeting.

select-language.introduction:
Welcome to 121. Please select your language.

Bienvenu chez 121. Choisi votre langue.

Bienvenido a 121. Selecciona tu idioma.

store-credential.done: Your Digital ID has been activated by NGO.
store-credential.received: Your Digital ID is received on your device.
store-credential.stored: Your Digital ID is stored in your wallet.

handle-proof.creating: You have given us sufficient personal information to see if you can be part of the program.
handle-proof.notify: We will notify you if you have been included.
handle-proof.inclusion-status-positive: Thank you for your patience. You have been included in the program.
handle-proof.inclusion-status-negative: Thank you for your patience. You have not been included in the program.
